name: dev-monorepo
description: Hanzo Dev - AI-powered development assistant with Training-Free GRPO and DeepSeek support

scripts.build: cd hanzo-dev && cargo build --release --bin dev --bin dev-tui --bin dev-exec
scripts.build:dev: cd hanzo-dev && cargo build --bin dev --bin dev-tui --bin dev-exec
scripts.fix: cd hanzo-dev && cargo fmt && cargo fix --allow-dirty && cargo clippy --fix --allow-dirty
